name: Hope (itch) (marcossiqueira)
description: The planet Bumi lived in harmony until they were dominated and enveloped in darkness, demons (monsters), began to be attracted by the planet and became their abode. The planet is in darkness and chaos, frightening beings that once didn't exist now walk over Bumi's surface. Litch takes pity on that planet, which was once so peaceful and harmonious, to release and bring light again. Demons (monsters) are found along the way, and your objective will be to destroy them. And free every area of the game played. In the end you'll defeat the monster (Demon Mor), and you'll have to finish him.
